ðŸ“– Summary: MCP Tools is a versatile command-line interface designed for interacting with Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers. It supports multiple transport methods (HTTP, stdio), offers various output formats, and includes features like mock server creation, proxying, interactive shells, and project scaffolding. The tool enables users to discover, call, and manage tools, resources, and prompts from any MCP-compatible server.
